metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39928 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the MediaRecorder API of WebkitWebKitGTK 2.40.5. A specially crafted web page can abuse this vulnerabilityto cause memory corruption and potentially arbitrary code execution. A userwould need to to visit a malicious webpage to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
